ygData.msgSnippet: /_ Delta/_ Delta realized he would not be with his leader on his first mission......he stood then with a stunned look.  He saw Scattershot and Nemesis

/_\Delta/_\

Delta realized he would not be with his leader on his first mission......he 
stood then with a stunned look.  He saw Scattershot and Nemesis Enforcer 
transformed and start to take off. Just then it hit him that was an order 
form his leader, and he must carry it out.......for some reason.  It was 
weird to see a bot transform, he wondered why.

He started to walk out when Zardus warned him of the extreme enegron and 
that we have developed a shield for it, the transformation you just saw.  
but he said he didn't have time to install it in me, but he did have this 
ready.  A enegron force field.  He told me it's a enegron blocking shield. 
it won't block and physical and energy attack, but it will block 
enegron...........but the down said it's un-tested. he told me just to say 
"Field on" and it should work........hopefully.  and with that, i went to 
catch up with the other two.

Protoform 5 ran at his max speed towards the exit (i know, i know you're 
going to say "but Bill......He doesn't know the ship that well!!" -_-() deal 
with it! it's late, and i got work tomorrow!) and when the ship exit door 
open he jumped out. "FIELD ON!" he yelled at the top of his speakers.  A 
light green flash like a sphere surrounded him and dissipated.  He landed  
right in fount of Nemesis and Scattershot.
